Title: Sins of a Father
Writer: Andrew Piddington, Andrew Piddington, Tim Rose Price, Tim Rose Price
Actors: Weston Gavin, Luke Hope, Jill Meager, David Oakes
Plot: At the memorial for his father, WWII hero, Major James Prentis (Alan Bates), John (Lambert Wilson) confesses a dark family secret to his own son, something that he has harbored for over ...
